item.description:
Paint the town(s) Ron!
We will use up our allocation of signs in a blitz that will be visible all over Nashua and Merrimack, Hollis, Milford, Amherst, whatever the volunteers will cover).

Bring signs if you have 'em, we'll have some if you don't. BRING SIGNS IF YOU HAVE THEM.

Maybe some of the out-of-towners will join us.

Last chance for this primary!!!
item.how_to_find_us: We will have signs with us.
item.why: We will leave a wake-up call for Tuesday morning all over our towns.
item.name: Sign BOMB!
